title: ISic000904. I.Sicily inscription 000904
body:
Facsimile Images

1[...]ΤΩΡΙΝΟΣ
2[.]ΝΘΑΔΕΚΕ
3[.....]ΠΟΣΕΙΔΙΟΣ
4⳨⳨

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Orsi ;
  • 4: The second staurogram is reported by Orsi as simply Ρ

English translation

Biktorinos lies here, his own resting place ((staurogram)) ((palm)) ((staurogram))

commentary
